CustomField.description: The date by which this advice status must be complete based on the current status and the SLA that applies. Blank if no SLA applies to that status.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( OW_status_sla__c ), null, OW_status_start_date_formula__c + CASE( MOD( OW_status_start_date_formula__c - DATE(1900, 1, 1), 7), 0, OW_status_sla__c + FLOOR(OW_status_sla__c / 5) * 2, 1, OW_status_sla__c + FLOOR((OW_status_sla__c + 1) / 5) * 2, 2, OW_status_sla__c + FLOOR((OW_status_sla__c + 2) / 5) * 2, 3, OW_status_sla__c + FLOOR((OW_status_sla__c + 3) / 5) * 2, 4, OW_status_sla__c + FLOOR((OW_status_sla__c + 4) / 5) * 2, 5, OW_status_sla__c + FLOOR(OW_status_sla__c / 5) * 2 + 2, 6, OW_status_sla__c + FLOOR(OW_status_sla__c / 5) * 2 + 1, null) )
CustomField.label: Status due date (formula)
